movie.title: The Reluctant Dragon
movie.director: Alfred L. Werker, Hamilton Luske, Jack Cutting, Ub Iwerks, Jack Kinney
movie.writer: Kenneth Grahame (based on the story by), Ted Sears (screenplay), Al Perkins (screenplay), Larry Clemmons (screenplay), William Cottrell (screenplay), Harry Clork (screenplay), Erdman Penner (story), T. Hee (story), Joe Grant (story), Dick Huemer (story), John P. Miller (story)
movie.actors: Robert Benchley, Frances Gifford, Buddy Pepper, Nana Bryant
movie.plot: Humorist Robert Benchley attempts to find Walt Disney to ask him to adapt a short story about a gentle dragon who would rather recite poetry than be ferocious. Along the way, he is given a tour of Walt Disney Studios, and learns about the animation process.
